code: /* eslint-disable react/prop-types */import"./PreviousNext.css";import arrowLeftImage from"./../../assets/img/arrow_left.png";import arrowRightImage from"./../../assets/img/arrow_right.png";import Button from"../button/Button";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var PreviousNextArrow=function PreviousNextArrow(_ref){var selectedProject=_ref.selectedProject,projects=_ref.projects;console.log(selectedProject);console.log(projects);var onNextProjectClick=function onNextProjectClick(){window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:"smooth"});};var onPreviousProjectClick=function onPreviousProjectClick(){window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:"smooth"});};var isLastProject=function isLastProject(){return selectedProject.id===projects[projects.length-1].id;};var isFirstProject=function isFirstProject(){return selectedProject.id===projects[0].id;};var selectedProjectId=selectedProject.id;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"work-link",to:"/project/".concat(parseInt(selectedProjectId)-1,"#project"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"previous_btn ".concat(isFirstProject()?"hide":"show"),imageURL:arrowLeftImage,handler:onPreviousProjectClick})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"work-link",to:"/project/".concat(parseInt(selectedProjectId)+1,"#project"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"next_btn ".concat(isLastProject()?"hide":"show"),imageURL:arrowRightImage,handler:onNextProjectClick})})]});};export default PreviousNextArrow;
